Human rights in Morocco Index 14: Morocco ratified the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Sale of Children, Child Prostitution and Child Pornography in 2001, signed it in 2000, and introduced it in the same year. It is associated with the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 17: Morocco ratified the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the International Convention for the Protection of All Persons from Enforced Disappearance in 2013, signed them in 2007, and introduced them in 2006. These treaties are under the umbrella of the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 2: Morocco ratified the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights in 1979, signed it in 1977, and introduced it in 1966. It is associated with the United Nations, with additional ties to the United States of America and languages including Arabic and French.
Human rights in Morocco Index 6: Morocco introduced the International Convention on the Suppression and Punishment of the Crime of Apartheid and the First Optional Protocol to the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights in 1973 but has neither signed nor ratified them. These are associated with the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 10: Morocco introduced the Second Optional Protocol to the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights, aiming at the abolition of the death penalty, in 1989 but has neither signed nor ratified it. It is associated with the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 4: Morocco introduced the First Optional Protocol to the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights and the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights in 1966 but has not ratified them. These are associated with the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 3: Morocco ratified the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights and the International Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination in 1979, signed them in 1977, and introduced them in 1966. These are associated with the United Nations.
Human rights in Morocco Index 16: Morocco ratified the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in 2009, introduced it in 2006, and has not signed it. It is associated with the United Nations.
